trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around July 2nd 2010
Summary: A dim satellite looking object moved across the sky, north to south and veered east before disappearing from sight.
divs: sighting detailsi went outside of my house as i do most nights to survey the night sky as i usually do in good weather. i look for anything moving such as meteors, comets, etc.... hoping to see a ufo someday. as i looked up, i saw at about one third of the distance toward the eastern horizen, a very dim object that i thought was a satellite, moving very fast from north to south and veer off to the east before disappearing from view. this took about 3 to 4 seconds. there was no trail so it could not have been a meteor. i have seen plenty of meteors and i know this was not one. it wasn't a bird. it moved to fast. i would say it had to be moving at about 2,500 to 3,000 mph. this is just a guess. it also was not a jet plane. i was in the naval air arm and i would know if this was a jet plane. no noise, no jet trail, moving very fast. i think i finally saw a ufo. my feelings were: what the heck....and i stood there looking for something more...and there was nothing more. i kept looking up for about three more minutes and saw nothing more. it was like a complete letdown. i then went inside to tell my wife what i just saw. i thought about what i just saw and then thought about getting in touch with stanton friedman. after a while, my wife went on the internet and brought up his site. it referred me to your mufon site. *wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms.
